title: Dean's Leadership and Innovation Forum
cleaned_text: The Dean's Pharmacy Leadership and Innovation Forum hosts several outstanding alumni and friends of Purdue Pharmacy each spring semester. The Forum, designed to introduce students to emerging trends and career opportunities in pharmacy and the pharmaceutical sciences through exposure to leaders in professional and corporate environments, provides an opportunity for the exchange of ideas and promotes greater understanding of leadership in the profession of pharmacy. Students benefit from the varied experiences of the guest lecturers, and the lecturers enjoy the lively exchange of questions and answers by well-informed students. The College of Pharmacy is pleased to recognize the following guest lecturers. Spring 2023 Forum Speakers January 31, 2023 Senior Vice President and Head of Corporate Development and Business Development & Licensing at Merck & Co., Inc. Associate Vice President, Global Vaccines & Biologics Manufacturing Financial Planning & Analysis at Merck & Co., Inc February 7, 2023 [Don Kiepert, BS 1971 & MS 1973](/alumni-friends/awards-recognition/deans-leadership-and-innovation-forum/don-kiepert-bs-1971-ms-1973) Executive Chairman, CEO, and Board Member February 14, 2023 Senior Vice President, Pharmacy Services at CPS February 21, 2023 Senior Vice President, Business Unit Head at Syneos Health February 28, 2023 Vice President, Pharmacy Procurement, Specialty and Patient Care at Albertsons Companies March 7, 2023 Vice President, Centers of Excellence at Deaconess Health System March 21, 2023 [Jason Lennon, PharmD 2005](/alumni-friends/awards-recognition/deans-leadership-and-innovation-forum/jason-lennen-pharmd-2005) Command Surgeon at Air Force District of Washington at the United States Air Force March 28, 2023 CEO, EmsanaRx April 4, 2023 Pharmacist at Topeka Pharmacy President at Topeka Pharmacy April 11, 2023 [Beth Brown (2023 Eaton Award Winner), BS 1991](/alumni-friends/awards-recognition/deans-leadership-and-innovation-forum/beth-brown-2023-eaton-award-winner-bs-1991) President and Principal Consultant at Brown Squared Consulting LLC; Chief Technology Officer at REV Pharmaceuticals April 18, 2023 Founder of Singota Solutions/BioConvergence, LLC April 25, 2023 Pharmacy Director at Rophe Free Clinic Previous Speakers |Mr. Hamid A.
